name: io.github.kryptobaseddev/cleo-mcp-server
title: CLEO MCP Server
description: Task management protocol for solo developers and AI coding agents with 2-gateway CQRS pattern. MCP server is included in the @cleocode/cleo package.

environmentVariables.name: CLEO_PROJECT_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Path to CLEO project directory (must contain .cleo/ folder)

tools.name: cleo_query
tools.description: Read-only operations across 11 domains: tasks, session, orchestrate, research, lifecycle, validate, release, system, issues, skills, providers

tools.name: cleo_mutate
tools.description: Write operations across 11 domains: tasks, session, orchestrate, research, lifecycle, validate, release, system, issues, skills, providers

features: CQRS 2-gateway pattern (94% token reduction vs traditional MCP tool approach)
Anti-hallucination validation on all task operations
Atomic file operations with backup and rollback

migration.note: @cleocode/mcp-server is deprecated. Use @cleocode/cleo which includes CLI, MCP server, and all tools in a single package.
